Posts.Content: Boston2015 wrote: Hi Everyone, My doctor just told me he wants to start me on Abraxine instead of taxol. I just have my fourth infusion of AC today. I was wondering what side effects anyone has had and did it help shrink the tumor? Surgery 6/3/2015 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Dx 11/4/2015, IDC, Stage IB, Grade 3, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 12/4/2015 AC + T (Taxol) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Abraxine Boston2015 WinningSoFar
